response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for us at $1,000,000. I understand its significance to you and would like to extend a special offer. Considering the mutual benefits and the importance of this product to both parties, I propose to sell it to you for $950,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a reasonable premium. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
